statements.select:
select * from (select manghiphep ,manhanvien ,hovaten ,ngaysinh ,machucdanh ,maphongban ,ngayxinnghitu ,songayxinnghi ,ngayxinnghiden ,songayphepconlai ,loaithoigian ,lydoxinnghi ,sodienthoai ,email ,nguoithaythetamthoi ,loaiphepnam ,duyetcap1 ,duyetcap1_ghichu ,duyetcap2 ,duyetcap2_ghichu ,xacnhantruockhivaolamlai ,xoa ,nguoitao ,ngaytao ,nguoihieuchinh ,ngayhieuchinh ,nghiphep ,nghiom ,nghithaisan ,nghikhongluong ,nghiviecrieng ,nghikhac ,xacnhantruockhivaolamlaiten ,tenchucdanh ,(select tenphongban from m_donvi_phongban pb where pb.xoa='0' and pb.maphongban=Dondangkynghiphep.maphongban) as tenphongban ,thangsinh ,namsinh ,canhankh ,conkh ,chame_mat ,ongba_mat,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY manghiphep desc) as row from Dondangkynghiphep where xoa='0' and (CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghitu, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103) or CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghiden, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103)) and maphongban='$maphongban$') tbl1 where tbl1.xoa='0' and tbl1.row >= $trangbd$ and tbl1.row <= $trangkt$
and manghiphep=$manghiphep$
and maphongban='$maphongban$'
and nguoitao=$nguoitao$
order by manghiphep desc

select manghiphep ,manhanvien ,hovaten ,ngaysinh ,machucdanh ,maphongban ,ngayxinnghitu ,songayxinnghi ,ngayxinnghiden ,songayphepconlai ,loaithoigian ,lydoxinnghi ,sodienthoai ,email ,nguoithaythetamthoi ,loaiphepnam ,duyetcap1 ,duyetcap1_ghichu ,duyetcap2 ,duyetcap2_ghichu ,xacnhantruockhivaolamlai ,xoa ,nguoitao ,ngaytao ,nguoihieuchinh ,ngayhieuchinh ,nghiphep ,nghiom ,nghithaisan ,nghikhongluong ,nghiviecrieng ,nghikhac ,xacnhantruockhivaolamlaiten ,tenchucdanh ,(select tenphongban from m_donvi_phongban pb where pb.xoa='0' and pb.maphongban=Dondangkynghiphep.maphongban) as tenphongban ,thangsinh ,namsinh ,canhankh ,conkh ,chame_mat ,ongba_mat ,thoigian from Dondangkynghiphep where xoa='0'
and manghiphep=$manghiphep$
order by manghiphep ASC

select manghiphep ,hovaten ,songayxinnghi ,nguoitao ,nghiphep ,canhankh ,conkh ,chame_mat ,ongba_mat from Dondangkynghiphep where xoa='0' and duyetcap1='1'
and nguoitao=$nguoitao$
and (CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghitu, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103) or CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghiden, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103))

SELECT count(*) FROM Dondangkynghiphep WHERE xoa = '0'
and manghiphep=$manghiphep$
and maphongban='$maphongban$'
and nguoitao=$nguoitao$
and (CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghitu, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103) or CONVERT(smalldatetime, ngayxinnghiden, 103) BETWEEN CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghitu$', 103) AND CONVERT(smalldatetime, '$nghiden$', 103))
statements.update: UPDATE Dondangkynghiphep SET manhanvien='$manhanvien$' ,hovaten=N'$hovaten$' ,ngaysinh='$ngaysinh$' ,machucdanh='$machucdanh$' ,maphongban='$maphongban$' ,ngayxinnghitu='$ngayxinnghitu$' ,songayxinnghi='$songayxinnghi$' ,ngayxinnghiden='$ngayxinnghiden$' ,songayphepconlai='$songayphepconlai$' ,loaithoigian='$loaithoigian$' ,lydoxinnghi=N'$lydoxinnghi$' ,sodienthoai='$sodienthoai$' ,email='$email$' ,nguoithaythetamthoi=N'$nguoithaythetamthoi$' ,nghiphep='$nghiphep$' ,nghiom='$nghiom$' ,nghithaisan='$nghithaisan$' ,nghikhongluong='$nghikhongluong$' ,nghiviecrieng='$nghiviecrieng$' ,nghikhac='$nghikhac$' ,duyetcap1='0' ,duyetcap1_ghichu=N'$duyetcap1_ghichu$' ,duyetcap2='0' ,duyetcap2_ghichu=N'$duyetcap2_ghichu$' ,xacnhantruockhivaolamlai='$xacnhantruockhivaolamlai$' ,xoa='0' ,nguoihieuchinh=$nguoitao$ ,ngayhieuchinh = GETDATE() ,canhankh='$canhankh$' ,conkh='$conkh$' ,chame_mat='$chame_mat$' ,ongba_mat='$ongba_mat$' ,hieuchinh=$hieuchinh$ ,thoigian='$thoigian$' WHERE manghiphep=$manghiphep$
UPDATE Dondangkynghiphep SET duyetcap1='$duyetcap1$' ,duyetcap2='$duyetcap2$' ,duyetcap1_ghichu=N'$duyetcap1_ghichu$' ,duyetcap2_ghichu= N'$duyetcap2_ghichu$' WHERE manghiphep=$manghiphep$
UPDATE Dondangkynghiphep SET xoa='1' ,nguoihieuchinh=$nguoitao$ ,ngayhieuchinh= GETDATE() WHERE manghiphep=$manghiphep$
UPDATE Dondangkynghiphep SET duyetcap1='$duyetcap1$' ,ngayhieuchinh= GETDATE() WHERE manghiphep=$manghiphep$
UPDATE Dondangkynghiphep SET duyetcap2='$duyetcap2$' ,ngayhieuchinh= GETDATE() WHERE manghiphep=$manghiphep$
statements.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Dondangkynghiphep WHERE xoa = '0' and manghiphep=$manghiphep$ and duyetcap1='1'
SELECT count(*) FROM Dondangkynghiphep WHERE xoa = '0' and manghiphep=$manghiphep$ and duyetcap2='1'
SELECT hieuchinh FROM Dondangkynghiphep WHERE xoa = '0' and manghiphep=$manghiphep$
